message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I believe I can't justify spending $14,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $13,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a significant compromise, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, could you consider $13,000 as a fair price for the product?
